section.title: Dependencies
section.para: Our application uses Hibernate as persistence provider and HSQLDB as (in-memory-)database. So we have to add the appropriate dependencies to our pom.xml file (between the <dependencies></dependencies> section). As we don't need it, we replace the dependency to JUnit, that maven created:
